data.name: Space Accident VR
data.detailed_description:
Step into the future with our groundbreaking VR game set in the year 2119, where humanity embarks on a historic journey into space. Witness the turning point in space exploration history as nations rush to colonize the uncharted territories of our solar system. Join the "CCM-1" (Callisto Colonization Mission) expedition, aimed at the enigmatic moon of Jupiter - Callisto.

VR EXPERIENCE:

Immerse yourself in the wonders of virtual reality as you become a part of the Callisto Colonization Mission. Feel the vastness of space, experience the thrill of interplanetary travel, and explore the mysteries of a distant moon, all in stunning VR. Every detail comes to life, providing you with an unparalleled sense of presence and immersion.

GAMEPLAY:

In this VR experience, you're not just a spectator; you're an active participant in the mission. Engage in challenging puzzles that require your wit and problem-solving skills. Unravel the gripping storyline that unfolds around you, and pay attention to every detail as it might hold the key to your next move. Delve deep into the intricacies of the game mechanics, enabling you to progress further in your cosmic journey.

Redirect Lasers:

Manipulate powerful lasers to overcome obstacles and unlock new paths.

Change the Properties of Fields:

Alter the properties of fields to your advantage, shaping the environment to suit your needs.

Activate the Switches:

Interact with various switches and mechanisms, crucial for advancing through the mission.

Information is Your Ally:

Use the provided information wisely; it's your guide in this vast, unknown space.

FEATURES

• Challenging Puzzles: Exercise your brain with puzzles that test your logical thinking and creativity.
• Discover Story Notes: Uncover hidden story notes that enrich the narrative, providing depth to your adventure.
• Beautiful Music: Immerse yourself in a captivating musical score that enhances the atmosphere and emotions of your journey.
• Master Game Mechanics: Explore and understand the subtleties of the game mechanics, empowering you to overcome challenges and progress in the mission.
• Prepare yourself for an unparalleled VR experience, where the future of humanity and the mysteries of space come alive around you. Are you ready to step into the unknown?

data.name: Scary Mine VR
data.detailed_description:
"Scary Mine" is a groundbreaking virtual reality horror game that beckons players into the haunting recesses of a long-forgotten mine, shrouded in mystery. Boasting lifelike graphics and intricately detailed environments, the game aims to seamlessly blur the lines between virtual and reality, immersing players in an unforgettable experience.

Set against the backdrop of dimly lit tunnels and foreboding chambers, "Scary Mine" presents players with a challenging mission to solve enigmatic occurrences and navigate the treacherous depths to survive. The game's dynamic narrative unfolds through a series of tasks and puzzles, encouraging players to make split-second decisions that shape the outcome of their journey.

The immersive atmosphere is heightened by atmospheric sound effects, ensuring that players feel the palpable tension with every step. "Scary Mine" is designed to provide a visceral and heart-pounding encounter with fear, as players confront their darkest fears in the unrelenting darkness of the mine.

Moreover, the game's adaptive structure allows players to explore a narrative that evolves based on their choices, offering multiple outcomes and encouraging replayability. With its captivating storyline and evocative atmosphere, "Scary Mine" caters to virtual reality horror enthusiasts, promising an experience that goes beyond conventional gaming. Brace yourself for an odyssey into the unknown, where the line between reality and fiction becomes indistinguishable, and survival demands strategic wit and courage.

data.short_description: "Scary Mine" is an immersive virtual reality horror game that plunges players into the eerie confines of an abandoned mine. With realistic graphics, spine-chilling sound effects, and split-second decision-making, players will unravel the unknown horrors lurking in the darkness.

content_descriptors.notes:
Game Content Description:

Welcome! Our game offers a horror-themed experience. However, it's important for potential players to be aware of some key elements that may capture their attention.

Horror Elements:
Our game includes tense moments, dark atmospheres, and an immersive storyline. Conflicts between characters and mysteries are designed to immerse players in a deep horror atmosphere.

Body Parts and Live Graphics:
The game may contain visual elements featuring body parts. These elements are used to enhance the impact of horror and tension. We recommend that sensitive players exercise caution regarding such content.

Jumpscare Warning:
Our game may include jumpscare elements during unexpected and intense moments. Sudden sounds and visuals can create surprising experiences for players. We advise players who may be sensitive to heart conditions or fear to be cautious in this regard.

Note: Our game does not include adult content such as  sexuality, non-consensual sexual acts, drugs, alcohol, or self-harm.

data.name: Eternal Spring VR
data.detailed_description:
SKY OF TIDES TRY OUT THE FREE DEMO

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120330/Sky_of_Tides/


SHUYAN SAGA

https://store.steampowered.com/app/594680/Shuyan_Saga/


About the Game

“ETERNAL SPRING (長春) VR” is an animated virtual reality documentary that brings us inside the world of a real-life survivor of religious persecution in China.



This immersive, 360 accompaniment to the feature film Eternal Spring (Hot Docs winner and Canada’s official 2023 Oscar® submission) features original recorded testimony and vivid artwork from acclaimed Chinese illustrator Daxiong (Star Wars, Justice League comics), brought to life in animation. A custom soundscape enhances the immersion when experienced with the Woojer haptic vest (optional).



WALK A MILE IN SOMEONE ELSE’S SHOES
Put yourself in the shoes of someone facing religious persecution in China. In mid-nineties northeast China, Jin Xuezhe is drawn to the slow-moving exercises of the Buddhist Falun Gong discipline, whose early morning meditators fill the parks of his hometown, Changchun. When the communist regime bans the popular practice in 1999, Jin is unwilling to sit by as disinformation in the state media maligns his faith and community. Tragically, however, speaking out against the growing propaganda and disappearances brings the risk of arrest, and worse.



This 12-minute interactive documentary combines live-action video and original recorded testimony with animated recreations brought to life from the drawings of acclaimed comic book artist Daxiong (Star Wars, Justice League), who, like Jin, was forced to flee Changchun to escape persecution.



This interactive VR film features a custom soundscape to trigger haptic sensations delivered through the new Woojer Vest (optional), which heightens the experience as cops arrest you on the street for handing out leaflets, and you get to feel the heart-pounding tension of a police interrogation in China.



ETERNAL SPRING (長春) VR works as a standalone experience, while also adding a new dimension to the animated documentary feature ETERNAL SPRING (長春), which was Canada’s official submission to the 2023 Academy Awards® for Best International Feature Film. Eternal Spring has screened in 86 film festivals on six continents, inside multiple national parliaments, and earned 26 awards and another 25 nominations. (See the film now on VICE, CBC, Arte, and others–visit Eternal Spring Film site for more information.)



USER WARNING If you suffer from heart conditions, have experienced related trauma, or are severely affected by real-world traumatic events, you may wish to speak first with your medical professional before engaging in this experience.

data.name: Scavenger vr
data.detailed_description:
This game requires Oculus Quest. If you do not have the device, you cannot use it.

You become a member of the rift investigation team and explore the unknown rift.
Collect dinosaur eggs while avoiding the dangerous dinosaurs there.
You can hatch dinosaur eggs to create your own dinosaur garden.

You can explore jungle, desert, and swamp areas.

Use capture bullets to collect resources and dinosaur eggs.

Dinosaurs can't see you, but they react to moving objects or sounds.

You can use lures, flashes, and smoke bombs to escape dangerous situations or make gathering easier.

Collect points to get upgraded and enjoy a great vacation!!

data.short_description: An unknown crack resembling the Mesozoic Era discovered in the near future. Collect dinosaur eggs while avoiding the eyes of dangerous dinosaurs. Collect dinosaur eggs and hatch them to collect dinosaurs!! Collect points to get upgraded and enjoy a great vacation!!

data.name: Gateway to the Kulikovo Field: The Battle of Yepifan
data.detailed_description:
Only you stand between Moscow and the Crimean army. It's the 16th century. Your task is to protect Russian lands! Hurry up to prepare the southern borders of Rus' for an enemy attack. How to do it?

- Solve numerous puzzles. Reveal the enemy's plan, show courage and ingenuity and turn the tide of the battle!

— Develop defensive tactics with the defenders of the Epifansky fort! Can you quickly load an ancient arquebus in the heat of battle?

- Find the enemy’s weak point and strike! Shoot accurately and quickly, there will be no second chance.

"The Gates of the Kulikovo Field. The Battle of Epifan" is a VR reconstruction created jointly with leading Russian historians. How was a 16th century gun loaded? What did the defenders of the southern borders of Rus' look like? How did you fight back a ruthless enemy? Become time travelers and get answers to these questions.

data.short_description: Find yourself in the center of a decisive battle for Russian lands. You are a 16th century Sagittarius. Repel the Crimean army, show valor and ingenuity in battle. Whether the enemy reaches Moscow or not depends on you!
data.supported_languages:
English, Russian*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

data.name: Seven Little Spider Kittens
data.detailed_description:
Prepare to be whisked away on a mesmerizing journey into the immersive realm of... Seven Little Spider Kittens? Sure, why not!
A fairly alright VR platformer action shooter that introduces the Spiderkittens, and Spidermom! for the first time in the history of mankind, blending feline agility(possibly also rockets) with arachnid prowess in an unprecedented gaming experience.

Seven Little Spider Kittens' isn't just a game—it's an unforgettable adventure that pushes your nausea tolerance to the limit! (This may or may not be true)

It's a lovely day to lose your children, so go find your seven little spider kittens and bring them home in this relaxing hybrid VR platformer/shooter/eater

We do not collect any data from our users _at all_
Our games are telemetry-free, we do not know where you live, what you ate for breakfast, nor who your grandma is

If you have any questions, head over to our discord
data.ai_description: Embark on an enchanting journey with Seven Little Spider Kittens, a delightful VR game that combines feline agility with arachnid prowess. Join Spidermom as she searches for her seven adorable spider kittens in a thrilling adventure that is perfect for the whole family. Explore immersive worlds, test your skills

data.name: Drum Legend
data.detailed_description:
We proudly launch Drum Legend 2.0 !

Drum Legend is a music rhythm game with multiple drumming gameplay options. In the 'Drum Maestro' mode,you can simulate a band drummer ,learn a variety of drumming skills, and play your favorite music In the 'Rhythm Rush' mode, challenge yourself with more difficult tracks, aim for higher scores.
The game now support Custom Songs! Visit our Discord for Import Guide and get the Song Editor.（Please click the Discord link at the bottom）

- Drum Maestro:
Simulate playing the drum kit and get a taste of being in a band!
This mode comes with a certain level of difficulty. If you haven't played the drum kit before, you can start practicing with the 'Practice Album' song pack.
Enjoy a refined drumming experience with professionally designed drum charts, gradually becoming a VR Soulful Drummer.

- Rhythm Rush:
Don't make any miss, smash all notes accurately!
This mode is easy to pick up, but achieving SSS ranks or challenging level 9+ tracks requires continuous practice.
Every season, we release new featured song packs with meticulously designed music and charts for an exhilarating rhythmic experience.

We welcome your feedback to help us improve the product experience.If you encounter any problems while playing, please contact us at：drumlegend2023@gmail.com

Discord：https://discord.gg/CdCkmZ6UJ5

data.name: VR Waifu - MuChan
data.detailed_description:
Is it cold in the night? Don't worry, "Mu" Chan is make a hot night. You can quick to play with her. So, you get warm faster than GPU temperature.



What? have you seen this object before? It's like... ok , but "His name is Willy". Please get easy like yours. Use "Willy", You can play at standing, sitting, and bedding!



Would you like play different position from always.
For example... My favorite position is doggy and play under her body. It's beautiful.



It's very easy to play, grab "Willy" and stroke it up and down. You can control play from gently to hard thrust, Let's try your technique!
If you stroke it well, "Willy" will feel good. Gentleman, have a good time!

data.short_description: Not frustrating control, Not long tutorial, Not lost Willy anywhere. Because Willy is in your hands..."VR Waifu" is easy to play!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit OS required
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest2
  • Additional Notes: Requires VR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters depicted are over the age of 18.
This game adult content including full nudity, language, sexual scenes. please make sure you are in the right place to avoid any unnecessary attention.

data.ai_description: Experience a fun and interactive game at our VR cafe where you can play with "Willy" in different positions like standing, sitting, and lying down. Use your technique to stroke "Willy" gently or with more force to make him feel good. It's a great way to warm up on

data.name: Happy Hour Hero
data.detailed_description:
Happy Hour Hero is a cartoony, flow-state bartending game that boasts:
  • Four core modes - Happy Hour, Easy Casual, Normal Casual, and Hardcore!
  • Two minigames - Dart Attack and Bowling!
  • Seven drinks to master and a full bar to keep stocked!
  • Four leaderboards to climb!
  • Options for all playstyles - seated, standing, and roomscale. Smooth motion, snap turning, and teleportation!


We’ve not had a lot of luck hiring competent bar staff, but I have a feeling you’re the right one for the job. Keep the beer stocked, the spirits flowing, and the customers merry. Oh, and if you mess up, it’s coming out of your paycheck. It gets pretty busy, so just stay on your toes and don’t get mixed up. Alright? Welcome to the team.


Test your spirits!

If your shift goes well, you might just earn a spot on the global leaderboards. Fancy yourself a pro-mixer? Join the highballers in hardcore mode.

On-the-job training!

Not feeling competitive? Play in casual mode and serve customers who couldn’t care less!

Customers getting you down?

Take part in teambuilding activities and compete with your colleagues - score high in darts or smash bottles in the bowling alley - drinks on the loser!

Get your hands dirty!

We built this bar from the ground up for VR, so you'd better make it a success!

data.short_description: 🥃 Time is short, just like our signature cocktail. Will you make a stir and gain recognition as best bartender in town, or get mixed up and bottle it? 🍸
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1400 or Intel i5 7400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / Radeon RX 470
  • VR Support: Meta/Oculus headsets and Valve Index supported. Roomscale and Seated. OpenXR, requires motion controllers.

data.ai_description: Happy Hour Hero is a fun and colorful bartending game with four different modes to suit all playstyles.
